/*
 * This is sample code generated by rpcgen.
 * These are only templates and you can use them
 * as a guideline for developing your own functions.
 */

#include "pal.h"
#include<string.h>
struct Output *
doopreation_1_svc(struct Input *argp, struct svc_req *rqstp)
{
	static struct Output  result;
	char str[40];
	int i,len,flag=0;
	strcpy(str,argp->str);
	printf("\nString is %s",str);
	
	len=strlen(str);
		for(i=0;i<len;i++)
		{
			if(str[i]!=str[len-i-1])
			{
				flag=1;
				break;
			}
		}
		if(flag==1)
		{
			strcpy(result.out,"String is not palindrome");
			
		}
		if(flag==0)
		{
			strcpy(result.out,"String is palindrome");
		}

	return &result;
}
